items.title: Agri Picks Report May 07, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Sowing of rabi crops in Telangana reached nearly 8.0 million acres (1 acre = 0.4 hectares) as of Wednesday, up 18% from 6.8 million acres a year ago, according to a report released by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Midcaps Poised For Nervous Start After India Strikes Terror Camps In Pakistan| Opening Bell Live
items.description:
GIFT Nifty hints at nervous start after 'Operation Sindoor'. In the pre-dawn hours of wednesday, india’s army, navy, and air force launched operation sindoor, an unprecedented tri‑services strike on nine terror camps across pakistan and pakistan‑occupied kashmir. This coordinated assault, the first of its kind against pakistan since the 1971 war, was ordered in retaliation for the april  22 terror attack in pahalgam that claimed 26 civilian lives, most of them tourists. What will be the impact on markets? Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Kunal Rambhia, Fund Manager, The Streets (Technical) and A Balasubramanian 
Managing Director and CEO,  Aditya Birla Sun Life AMC Limited.

items.title: GP Petroleums shares in focus on signing JV agreement With West Coast Oils LLP
items.description: GP Petroleums Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 93.45 and a 52-week low of Rs 36.00 on 17 September, 2024 and 07 April, 2025, respectively.

items.title: NLC India shares in focus on signing agreement with RVUNL for 810 MW solar power project
items.description: NLC India Share Price | The company has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with IREL (India) to cooperate and collaborate for development (Mining/Excavation/Refining etc.) of mutually agreed assets of critical mineral in general including REE by acquiring assets /sourcing raw materials domestically or internationally.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty opens below 24,300, Sensex down 200 pts; airline, defence stocks in focus
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Tata Motors, Shriram Finance, Apollo Hospitals, Bajaj Finance, Hindalco were among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers were Asian Paints, Titan Company, TCS, L&T, Tech Mahindra.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) extended their buying on 14th day as they bought equities of Rs 3,784 crore on May 6. However, after six days of buying, Domestic institutional investors (DIIs) turned net buyers as they sold equities of Rs 1,397 crore on same day.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: BSE, NLC India, GMDC, GP Petroleums, HPCL, Godrej Consumer, KEI Industries, Paytm, Mahanagar Gas in focus on 7 May
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 07 May: Stocks like eMudhra, KEI Industries, Piramal Enterprises, Aarti Drugs, Aptus Value Housing Finance India, Kansai Nerolac Paints, Shriram Finance, Sun Pharmaceutical Industries, Life Insurance Corporation of India, Prestige Estates Projects, Restaurant Brands Asia, and Gujarat Mineral Development Corporation will be in focus on May 7.

items.title: IndiGo, SpiceJet shares fall after announcing flight cancellations post-Operation Sindoor
items.description: The Indian government closed nearly 16 airports in northern and western parts of the country for civilian movement on May 7 after the military operation

items.title: Q4 results impact: MRF shares surge 4% after net profit jumps 29%; HUDCO, CarTrade tumble
items.description: Q4 results impact: MRF announced a final dividend of Rs 229 per share for the financial year 2025.

items.title: Paytm shares surge 8% after solid Q4 results: Should you buy, sell or hold?
items.description: Paytm share price: JM Financial reiterated its 'Buy' rating on the stock, with a target price of Rs 1,070

items.title: Q4FY25 earnings impact: Aarti Drugs shares up 14% on profit growth, MGL and KEI shares higher up to 4%
items.description: Mahanagar Gas' net profit fell nearly 5 percent YoY to Rs 252 crore in Q4 FY25. This, however, marks a rise of nearly 12 percent from the net profit reported in Q3FY25.

items.title: Technical View: Nifty closes above 24,400 amid volatility; critical resistance at 24,500
items.description: Broader indices outperformed the main indices with Nifty midcap index rising 1.6 percent and smallcap index added 1.4 percent.
